name: SouthBendTribunecom
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des: When it comes to news in South Bend and the rest of Michiana, we offer the real story. In real time. The South Bend Tribune is you No. 1 source for breaking news, opinion and analysis, and thought-provoking coverage of the topics that matter to you.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
